item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post on this my new blog. Let me try the asciidoctor’s source feature. public class Hello { public static void main(String... args) { System.out.println("Hello, world"); } }

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello, world! I am tryin asciidoc on hugo. Does it work right? Hello world! public class Hello { public static void main(String... args) { System.out.println("Hello, world"); } } Seems working? Nice! Does asciidoctorj work? → No…​ +-----+ |Hello| +-----+
